law.catch_line: Injunctive relief for violation of KRS 248.752 or 248.754.
law.text: Any person who sells, distributes, or manufactures cigarettes and sustains direct economic or commercial injury as a result of a violation of KRS 248.752 or 248.754 may bring an action in good faith for appropriate injunctive relief.
law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 9, effective January 1, 2002.
